mutants.code:
import collections
import re

def get_most_used_words(string):
    words = re.findall('', string.lower())
    freq = collections.Counter(words)
    sorted_freq = sorted(freq.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    most_used_words = [word for (word, count) in sorted_freq[:10]]
    return most_used_words

mutants.original_line: sorted_freq = sorted(freq.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)

import collections
import re

def get_most_used_words(string):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', string.lower())
    freq = collections.Counter(words)
    sorted_freq = sorted(freq.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=False)
    most_used_words = [word for (word, count) in sorted_freq[:10]]
    return most_used_words

mutants.code:
import collections
import re

def get_most_used_words(string):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', string.lower())
    freq = collections.Counter(words)
    sorted_freq = sorted(freq.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    most_used_words = [word for (word, count) in sorted_freq[:-10]]
    return most_used_words
